ygData.subject: Re: The old brass problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the reason there is unfinished horns is the same reason why there are lute strings. as you may know there has been rumors that there is a skill we will
ygData.messageBody:
I think the reason there is unfinished horns is the same reason why there
are lute strings. as you may know there has been rumors that there is a
skill we will get eventually if they ever get it working that allows us to
create instruments. Problem is going to krak the aviak merchant is I am
dubious to him. So I guess Ill just have shout out for someone with faction
to look for me. Thanks for the info.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Valharick@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, November 20, 1999 8:21 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] The old brass problem


> From: Valharick@...
>
> The reason no animation is seen is because you dont have a target, but
that
> wont affect skill increase. If I remeber correctly I bought my horn in FP
> from the bard guild. If for some reason they no longer sell it, Krap
> Windbreaker...err Krak the aviak vendor sells them.
> I do not know what the unfinished trumpet is for. I have seen it but have
not
> heard anyone say what it might be used for.
> Anyways, g'luck to ya.
>
> Ren
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
